title: Metaverse-Based Language Learning Project: Enhancing Practical Communication Skills Using AR/VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary language proficiency
context.additional_context: Language practice program conducted in a mixed-reality environment utilizing personal smart devices (BYOD). Cultivation of employment-linked communication skills through team-based virtual collaboration projects

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform daily conversations and job-related expressions through interaction with 3D virtual characters in AR/VR environments at over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply situationally appropriate language strategies with over 90% participation while performing team projects on a metaverse platform.
At least a 70% improvement in language proficiency and cultural understanding can be achieved through formative assessments based on mixed reality.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
